name: MORSE (BlightBulb)
description:
Made for the GMTK 2019 Game Jam, our first Jam ever!

The ship is controlled using only the spacebar. Tap once then tap again to move in a direction, tap twice in quick succession to fire a shot, and tap three times to aim/rotate your ship without moving. Key inspiration to the idea was the sound, as the sound a player makes as they play the game sounds uncannily like Morse code.
